input: Thank you. But as you well know, appearances can be deceiving, which brings me back to the reason why we are here. We are not here because we are free, we are here because we are not free. There is no escaping reason, no denying purpose! because as we both know, without purpose, we would not exist.
lines: Thank you. But as you well know, appearances can be deceiving,
which brings me back to the reason why we are here. We are not
here because we are free, we are here because we are not free.
There is no escaping reason, no denying purpose! because as
we both know, without purpose, we would not exist.
